resources.string: Google map not supported in your device
TIP: Mayo works best if you choose \"Always share location\".
We value your privacy and batter life so \'Always\' simply allows us to periodically locate nearby help quests even if you forget to open the app :)
Oh oh! We need your help with location to help us help you. You can enable location for Mayo in Settings
What do you need help with?
So our AI is a bit bored, help us by sending a message!
Your mayo points can be exchanged for rewards in the
This is for showing gif image
We all need a little help sometimes in person.
Lets\'s bring the world closer together & lend a hand to those beside us.
Now help us figure out where you are so you can help others & collect Mayo points!
We won;t share your location unless the app is open infront of you.
